comment: The best online professor I have ever taken! No tests only open note quizzes (which she drops the lowest grade). Her assignments are actually fun and you are allowed to work with groups of up to three people. She also gives so much extra credit!

Worst professor at KSU! The most unprofessional, incredibly rude, and disorganized professor I have ever encountered. The class is a writing class. She grades are based on her feelings. Rodewig contradicts herself and is dishonest. I didn't learn anything. Please avoid taking her class.

I took Social Media MKTG online with Professor Rodewig. She was a straight forward, helpful professor. The assignments were easy to understand and any time I had questions she would answer right away. I recommend her as an online class, the class was easy to follow through the semester as well. She offers so so so SO much extra credit.

comment: Very knowledgeable about social media marketing. Accessible outside of class

I wasn't very engaged with this class overall since it was online (log in once a week, grind out assignments, repeat), but Professor Rodewig seems to really care about her students understanding the material. She gives great, extensive feedback on assignments & is very accessible if you need extra help with any of the material.

comment: Professor Rodewig is an amazing professor! She makes sure to explain things clearly and gives lots of great examples. I highly recommend. There are many in class assignments, a midterm, final, and a huge paper you can do with a partner (super interesting).
